alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, eastern Okeechobee, southeastern Indian River and Martin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tradition to 6 miles southeast of J And S Fish Camp. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Jupiter, Walton, Fort Pierce and Stuart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
